channel.title: Maxstat, and changing what level you need to weild it
channel.description:
I searched in "Player.Java", "Client.Java", and "Server.java" for "maxstat".
Any idea's? :]
And how do I change what level you need to weild the item?
Thanks, LOTS

item.title: Maxstat, and changing what level you need to weild it
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

CLAttack

CLDefence

CLStrength

Etc. Put

if(itemID == item) {
return lvlneeded;
}

Idk if its itemId but check, follow the format of other ones.

Read full topic
